name: 69 Iris Hot
description:
69 Iris Hot is a visual novel with puzzle elements, based on cyberpunk esthetic. Our heroine Iris is extremely attractive but hard to communicate with. She likes the excitement of solving the puzzles yet too unexpirienced in competing with others. Let's see how are going to break the ICE in her defense.

Features


  • Interactive gallery
  • Atmospheric music
  • Meditative gameplay
  • Sweet girl
